name: Last Forever: Part One
writer: Carter Bays (created by), Carter Bays (creator), Craig Thomas (created by), Craig Thomas (creator), Carter Bays, Craig Thomas
actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders, Cristin Milioti
plot: After Barney and Robin's wedding, Ted builds up the courage to approach "the mother" at the train station. Meanwhile, three years after the wedding, Barney and Robin drop a bombshell on the group.
